name: A Guide to Secure Data Encryption in PHP Applications
remark: Discusses the importance of end-to-end network-layer encryption (HTTPS) as well as secure encryption for data at rest, then introduces the specific cryptography tools that developers should use for specific use cases, whether they use [libsodium](https://pecl.php.net/package/libsodium), [Defuse Security's secure PHP encryption library](https://github.com/defuse/php-encryption), or OpenSSL.
